tool_description: API providing data over FIFA football events around the world
name: FIFA Data
title: FIFA Data

api_list.name: AllFifaWorldCupData
api_list.description: Retrieves all data involving FIFA world cups throughout time. Includes winning teams, losing teams, event venue, final scores, and event attendance
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fifa-data.p.rapidapi.com/FifaWorldCupFinals"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fifa-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fifa-data.p.rapidapi.com/FifaWorldCupFinals"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fifa-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
